creator: apache@snakefarm.org
text:
As far as I can see, mod_vhost_alias doesn't actually change the value of the
document root but it just adjusts r->filename. I have a module that uses
ap_document_root() and was surprised to find that it doesn't return the value
configured with VirtualDocumentRoot.

If you don't feel this should be changed maybe you can at least advise me how to
do it myself. Since ap_document_root() is marked "don't use this" I suppose it's
not a good idea to just override conf->ap_document_root.
